title: [K-12] Workshop on a 5-Step Structured Strategy to Improve Problem-Solving Skills for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Physics Concepts and Completion of Teacher Training Programs
context.additional_context: Composed of 15-minute mobile-based microlearning modules integrated with real-time feedback and collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Preservice science teachers can apply a structured 5-step strategy (problem definition-condition analysis-strategy development-execution-verification) with 90% accuracy when solving 12 types of physics problems
Problem representation skills can be transferred to three or more academic disciplines using scaffolding tools (checklists/visual maps)
Problem-solving portfolios meeting at least 80% of criteria for conceptual clarity, solution precision, and creativity can be submitted in team-based project evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
